snippet: Reverse mortgages allow borrowers to tap into the equity in their homes, but check out the fine print before signing for one.
abstract: Your Money Adviser column notes United States District Court for District of Columbia, in case brought against Department of Housing and Urban Development, rules in favor of homeowner who was not listed on reverse mortgage taken out on home by his wife before her death; lists questions to consider before taking out reverse mortgage.
lead_paragraph: Reverse mortgages allow borrowers to tap into the equity in their homes, but check out the fine print before signing for one.

headline.main: Surviving Spouses With Reverse Mortgages Win Case
